snippet: Port operators along the East Coast have reached a tentative contract deal with the union for longshoremen, averting a possible strike that would have crippled operations at 15 ports.
abstract: Port operators along the East Coast reach tentative contract deal with the union for longshoremen, averting a possible strike that would have crippled operations at 15 ports.
lead_paragraph: Port operators along the East Coast have reached a tentative contract deal with the union for longshoremen, averting a possible strike that would have crippled operations at 15 ports.

headline.seo: Dockworkers Reach Tentative Deal to Avert Port Strike
